title: Ticket #401: SLOT_TYPE_* parser doesn't EXCEPT on nonsense
description:
The SLOT_TYPE_* code appears to silently ignore unsupported entries. For example, given the following: 

SLOT_TYPE_1 = cpus=50%,ram=50%
NUM_SLOTS_TYPE_1 = 1
SLOT_TYPE_2 = cpus=50%/($(NUM_SLOTS)-1),ram=50%/($(NUM_SLOTS)-1)
NUM_SLOTS_TYPE_2 = 2

The error is 

04/21 16:37:58 ERROR: Can't allocate 2nd slot of type 2
    Requesting: Cpus: 1, Memory: 1575, Swap: auto, Disk: auto
    Available:  Cpus: 1, Memory: 1, Swap: 100.00%, Disk: 100.00%
04/21 16:37:58 ERROR "Ran out of system resources" at line 590 in file ResMgr.cpp

The expected error would be 

04/21 16:37:58 ERROR: "100%/($(NUM_SLOTS)-1)" was not understood as part of SLOT_TYPE_2. You cannot use expressions here.
